Town.description:
The public-facing model that represents a town. More information about the town
is available for users who join it.

friendlyName.description: The name that users see on the landing page to determine which town to join

townID.description: An internal ID that is used to uniquely identify each town

currentOccupancy.description: The current number of players in this town

maximumOccupancy.description: The maximum number of players allowed in this town

TownCreateResponse.description: Payload that is sent back to a client upon creating a town

townID.description: The ID of the newly created town. This ID is needed to join the town.

townUpdatePassword.description: An "Update password" for the newly created town. This password is needed to update or delete the town.

TownCreateParams.description: Request body that specifies how to create a new town

friendlyName.description: A "Friendly Name" to use to identify the newly created town, which need not be unique to existing towns names

isPubliclyListed.description:
Players will identify towns by either knowing the (randomly generated) town ID, or the town ID will be publicly
listed along wiht the friendly name of the town. This behavior can be controlled when creating the town by changing
this flag.

mapFile.description:
Reserved for future use, currently only used for testing: this parameter can be
specified to control which Tiled map file is used for initializing the set of interactable areas

Not currently used on frontend

info.title: covey-town-townService
info.description: Backend service for processing Covey.Town town requests

get.description: List all towns that are set to be publicly available

200.description: The ID of the newly created town, and a secret password that will be needed to update or delete this town.

requestBody.description: The public-facing information for the new town

schema.description: The public-facing information for the new town

400.description: Invalid password or update values specified

patch.description: Updates an existing town's settings by ID

parameters.description: town update password, must match the password returned by createTown
parameters.name: X-CoveyTown-Password

400.description: Invalid password or update values specified

parameters.description: ID of the town to delete
parameters.name: townID

parameters.description: town update password, must match the password returned by createTown
parameters.name: X-CoveyTown-Password

post.description: Creates a conversation area in a given town

parameters.description: ID of the town in which to create the new conversation area
parameters.name: townID

parameters.description: session token of the player making the request, must match the session token returned when the player joined the town
parameters.name: X-Session-Token

requestBody.description: The new conversation area to create

schema.description: The new conversation area to create

post.description: Creates a viewing area in a given town

parameters.description: ID of the town in which to create the new viewing area
parameters.name: townID

parameters.description:
session token of the player making the request, must
match the session token returned when the player joined the town
parameters.name: X-Session-Token

requestBody.description: The new viewing area to create

schema.description: The new viewing area to create

post.description: Creates a poster session area in a given town

parameters.description: ID of the town in which to create the new poster session area
parameters.name: townID

parameters.description:
session token of the player making the request, must
match the session token returned when the player joined the town
parameters.name: X-Session-Token

requestBody.description: The new poster session area to create

schema.description: The new poster session area to create

patch.description: Gets the image contents of a given poster session area in a given town

parameters.description: ID of the town in which to get the poster session area image contents
parameters.name: townID

parameters.description: interactable ID of the poster session
parameters.name: posterSessionId

parameters.description:
session token of the player making the request, must
match the session token returned when the player joined the town
parameters.name: X-Session-Token

patch.description:
Increment the stars of a given poster session area in a given town, as long as there is
a poster image. Returns the new number of stars.

parameters.description: ID of the town in which to get the poster session area image contents
parameters.name: townID

parameters.description: interactable ID of the poster session
parameters.name: posterSessionId

parameters.description:
session token of the player making the request, must
match the session token returned when the player joined the town
parameters.name: X-Session-Token
